channel.title: Linux on EvanZhao
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on EvanZhao

item.title: Linux 常用命令
item.description: 环境变量 修改当前用户 vim ~/.bashrc 例：设置java环境变量 #set oracle jdk environment export JAVA8=/usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_191 export JAVA7=/usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.7.0_80 export JAVA_HOME=${JAVA7} export JRE_HOME=${JAVA_HOME}/jre export CLASSPATH=.:${JAVA_HOME}/lib:${JRE_HOME}/lib export PATH=${JAVA_HOME}/bin:$PATH export PATH=/usr/appengine/appengine-java-sdk-1.9.66//bin:$PATH export PATH=/usr/apache-ant-1.9.13//bin:$PATH export PS1="\[\e[32m\]\w\[\e[m\]\[\e[32m\] >\[\e[m\] " 使环境变量马上生效： source ~/.bashrc 用于所有用户： sudo vim /etc/profile
